org.mundo.net
Class AbstractHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.mundo.rt.Service
      org.mundo.net.AbstractHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEmits, IMessageHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AckHandler, DelayHandler
public abstract class AbstractHandler
extends Service
implements IMessageHandler, IEmits

This is a helper class for implementing custom protocol handlers. The forwarding methods emit_down and emit_up allow to implement protocol handlers without using mcc.

Author:
Erwin Aitenbichler

msg - the target message.
